attributes.action: reclassify the act of circumcision of males and females without anasthesia as child sexual abuse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How can it possibly be legal to hold down a little boy and chop part of his sexual organs off without any pain relief or even a qualified surgeon present. This is child abuse of the most serious nature and must be stopped.

For religious/family reasons, if people desire then they should be carried out in a hospital by a qualified professional with suitable pain relief to decrease the trauma.

The same is true for females although as there are 2 forms, complete removal and hood removal - complete removal should be banned outright, hood removal as with males should be carried out in hospital.

Abusing a childs genitals as a child severly affects the childs outlook and sexual enjoyment - function may be the same but the loss of 1000's of nerve endings has a major effect on sensation, 
why should a childs first memory be of excrusiating genital pain?.
